subject: For the newbie's or anyone that doesn't have one 1 12-470 old mod left

full_text:
hey guys,

I have one more 12-470 left I would like it to go to a new member 
trying to get started in the research. but if there are none interested 
then I will send it to someone who could not get one.

all I want is what it cost me + shipping and you got it.
e-mail me and let me know paranormalinvestigating@...


bruce
